sentences.chinese: 十六年，肅侯游大陵，出於鹿門，大戊午扣馬曰：「耕事方急，一日不作，百日不食。」
sentences.literal: Sixteenth year, Su Hou toured Da Ling, emerged at Lu Men, Da Wu Wu pulled horse said: 'Farming matters just urgent, one day not work, hundred days not eat.'
Seventeenth year, besieged Wei Huang, not conquer.

sentences.chinese: 十八年，齊、魏伐我，我決河水灌之，兵去。
sentences.literal: Eighteenth year, Qi, Wei attacked us, we broke river water flooded them, troops left.
Twenty-second year, Zhang Yi became prime minister of Qin.

sentences.chinese: 趙疵與秦戰，敗，秦殺疵河西，取我藺、離石。
sentences.literal: Zhao Ci with Qin battled, defeated, Qin killed Ci river west, took our Lin, Li Shi.

sentences.chinese: 二十三年，韓舉與齊、魏戰，死于桑丘。
sentences.literal: Twenty-third year, Han Ju with Qi, Wei battled, died at Sang Qiu.

sentences.chinese: 秦、楚、燕、齊、魏出銳師各萬人來會葬。
sentences.literal: Qin, Chu, Yan, Qi, Wei sent elite troops each ten thousand came to attend funeral.

sentences.chinese: 武靈王元年，陽文君趙豹相。
sentences.literal: Wu Ling Wang first year, Yang Wen Jun Zhao Bao became prime minister.

sentences.chinese: 梁襄王與太子嗣，韓宣王與太子倉來朝信宮。
sentences.literal: Liang Xiang Wang with crown prince Si, Han Xuan Wang with crown prince Cang came paid court Xin Gong.

sentences.chinese: 武靈王少，未能聽政，博聞師三人，左右司過三人。
sentences.literal: Wu Ling Wang young, not yet able listen governance, broad learning teachers three, left right oversee faults three.
